thread.title: The Commish Continues a Bad Year
thread.title_full: The Commish Continues a Bad Year

author: Harry
title: The Commish Continues a Bad Year
text: Posts: 1,139 The Commish Continues a Bad Year So Hardy plays today after his sham acquittal, but Washington continues to sit without any explanation to the fans. Even people in the NFL office are confused. Doesn't this guy feel he owes the fans anything? What I don't want to hear is they're protecting Washington's privacy. The NFL has never done that. I can think of no comparable case where a continued suspension is never explained.
